com.flurry.android.tumblr

Class TumblrShare

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flurry.android.tumblr.TumblrShare
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class TumblrShare
extends Object
    Listener for FlurryAgent. Flurry will do a one time authentication of the user and then post the shared content to Tumblr. 
     
 PhotoPost postImage = new PhotoPost("Your App's photo to post");
 postImage.setCaption("caption");
 postImage.setAndroidDeeplink("Your App's Android Deep Link to Content");
 postImage.setIOSDeepLink("Your App's iOS Deep Link to Content");
 postImage.setWebLink("Your App's Web Link to Content");
 postImage.setPostListener(fPostListener);
 TumblrShare.post(mContext, postImage);
    See Also:
    Flurry Publisher Support Site

    • Method Detail

      • getTumblrImage

        @Deprecated
public static android.graphics.Bitmap getTumblrImage()
        Deprecated. 
        Api to get the default Tumblr logo. The Bitmap returned has a default size of 35dp * 35dp. If you are planning to use different sizes please scale the bitmap using below api. Bitmap.createScaledBitmap(TumblrShare.getTumblrImage(), widthInPixel, heightInPixel);
        Returns:
        Bitmap of size 35dp * 35dp

      • setOAuthConfig

        @Deprecated
public static void setOAuthConfig(String consumerApiKey,
                                              String consumerApiSecret)
        Deprecated. 
        Set your app's consumer key and secret prior to making any post. Flurry will do a one time authentication of the user. Authenticating a user requires consumer api key and secret.
        Parameters:
        consumerApiKey - The consumer api key
        consumerApiSecret - The consumer api secret

      • post

        @Deprecated
public static void post(android.content.Context context,
                                    Post clickObj)
        Deprecated. 
        Posts the TextPost or PhotoPost to Tumblr.
        Parameters:
        context - A valid activity context
        clickObj - An instance of TextPost or PhotoPost
